Venture.tooltip: A venture & company separate from the members of Projk.

Hyper Projk.tooltip: This projk took or is taking years to complete.

Major Projk.tooltip: This projk took a couple of months to complete.

Minor Projk.tooltip: This projk took a few weeks to a month to complete.

Mini Projk.tooltip: This projk took a few days to a week to complete.

Micro Projk.tooltip: This projk took less than a day to complete!

On Hold.tooltip: This projk is currently on hold. Development may continue in the future.

Finished.tooltip: This projk is completed, and work probably won't continue.

Deceased.tooltip: No longer exists. Don't cry for me Argentina...

J & K.tooltip: Made in equal parts by both Jeremy and Kevin.

For Kicks.tooltip: Not for our careers, not even a proof of concept. Made purely for kicks.
